ygData.subject: Re: Last names?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Lvl 20 or so I think. ... I can t help but feel greatly aggravated at the number of people who sit there and camp at the ruins in the hopes of taking
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 21 Apr 1999, Ward Richardson wrote:

> From: Ward Richardson <jonah_right_here@...>
> Just wondering what you meant by "Almost Last-Named".
> When do you reach a point where you earn such a thing?

Lvl 20 or so I think.

> Thanks,
>
> Crossbones the Monk, Kicking 'round in Queynos.
>
> P.S. -> If anyone has any spare putrid rib bones, it
> would be greatly appreciated as I'm dying to get my
> next quest completed ;).

I can't help but feel greatly aggravated at the number of people who sit
there and camp at the ruins in the hopes of taking advantage of monks who
desperately need putrid rib bones. I find this amazingly lame. It ranks up
there with clerics charging for heals and other such things.

It's like a tank charging to party with you or some other such nonsense.

Those clerics who do keep it free have my undying loyalty.

Dirque
